price: 18. Yallaa kee kay farmoyta nummayse maraw! yallak meesita, usuk sin kah amrisem abtaanaah usuk sin как waaseemik waasimtaanamal, kaadu kulli nafsi beerah (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) taamak tatrusem wagitay, Kaadu Yallak meesita, diggah Yalli isin abba haytaanamak adda yaaxigi kinnik.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waltanẓur nafsun mā qaddamat lighadin wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
